{{Infobox Berry |name = #05 Aspear |image = [[File:Aspear.png]] |caption = This Berry's peel is hard, but the flesh inside is very juicy. It is distinguished by its bracing sourness. |growtime = 2m |harvest = 6 berries |replant = 50% |points = 9 |flavor =
*0 spicy *0 dry *0 sweet *0 bitter *10 sour }} '''Aspear''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]] to obtain [[Farming Points|farm points]]. It can be obtained as random drops by defeating wild Pok√©mons on routes. {| class="wikitable" ! Seed !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !!
